plays.text: Goal scored by Rob Blake assisted by Milan Hejduk and Greg de Vries
Penalty to Adam Hall 2 minutes for Obstruction - Tripping Alex Tanguay
Penalty to Milan Hejduk 2 minutes for Boarding Adam Hall
Penalty to Vaclav Nedorost 2 minutes for Interference Karlis Skrastins
Penalty to Kimmo Timonen 2 minutes for Interference Vaclav Nedorost
Penalty to Andreas Johansson 2 minutes for High Sticking Scott Parker
Penalty to Steve Reinprecht 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Karlis Skrastins
Penalty to Cale Hulse 2 minutes for Holding Peter Forsberg
Penalty to Greg de Vries 2 minutes for Tripping Bill Houlder
Goal scored by Andreas Johansson assisted by Scott Hartnell
Penalty to Jason York 2 minutes for Tripping Milan Hejduk
Penalty to David Legwand 2 minutes for Closing Hand on Puck(opposing player not identified)
